title: Chicken Sausage Skillet with Tuscan White Beans and Tomatoes
directions: Heat oil in a large, high-sided skillet over medium-high heat. Add sausages and lightly brown on all sides, for about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove to a plate. Add garlic and rosemary to the skillet and saute until fragrant, another 2 minutes. Season with salt, pepper and red pepper flakes. Stir in tomatoes and their juices, cannellini beans and 1/4 cup of water. Add the sausages back to the skillet and simmer for 10 minutes. Drizzle with olive oil before serving.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling
2 (15-ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
